snippet: Investors received encouraging news on the job market when a Labor Department report that said fewer people applied for unemployment aid last week.
abstract: Stocks rebound after three-day losing streak as investors respond to solid jobs data and other encouraging economic news.
lead_paragraph: Investors received encouraging news on the job market when a Labor Department report that said fewer people applied for unemployment aid last week.

headline.main: Market Ends Three-Day Losing Streak With Solid Gains
headline.print_headline: Market Rebounds After Three Days of Losses
